quote: My better is better than your better.
author: Unknown

quote: The only one who can tell you ‘you can’t’ is you. And you don’t have to listen.
author: Nike

quote: Training is the opposite of hoping.
author: Unknown

quote: All your life you are told the things you cannot do. All your life they will say you’re not good enough or strong enough or talented enough; they will say you’re the wrong height or the wrong weight or the wrong type to play this or be this or achieve this. THEY WILL TELL YOU NO, a thousand times no, until all the no’s become meaningless. All your life they will tell you no, quite firmly and very quickly. AND YOU WILL TELL THEM YES.
author: Unknown

quote: My agility denies your agility.
author: Unknown

quote: Failure’s not an option. It’s a step.
author: Unknown

quote: Strong is the new beautiful.
author: Nike

quote: Yesterday you said tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: Rewrite history. Redefine the position.
author: Unknown

quote: Be legendary.
author: Unknown

quote: Run the day. Don’t let it run you.
author: Unknown

quote: The road to athletic greatness is not marked by perfection, but the ability to constantly overcome adversity and failure.
author: Nike

quote: I believe in redefining my impossible.
author: Unknown

quote: If no one thinks you can then you have to.
author: Unknown

quote: Impossible is just a big word thrown around by small men who find it easier to the world they’ve been given than to explore the power they have to change it. Impossible is not a fact. It’s an opinion. Impossible is not a declaration. It’s a dare. Impossible is potential. Impossible is temporary.
author: Unknown

quote: Every professional was once an amateur.
author: Nike

quote: Somehow we’ve come to believe that greatness is only for the chosen few, for the superstars. The truth is, greatness is for us all. This is not about lowering expectations; it’s about raising them for every last one of us. Greatness is not in one special place, and it’s not in one special person. Greatness is wherever somebody is trying to find it. Find your greatness.
author: Unknown

quote: Willpower knows no obstacles. Find your greatness.
author: Unknown

quote: Start unknown. Finish unforgettable.
author: Unknown

quote: Test your faith daily.
author: Unknown

quote: The ones who say ‘you can’t’ are too afraid you will.
author: Nike

quote: Make yourself unstoppable.
author: Unknown

quote: You can feel sore tomorrow or you can feel sorry tomorrow. You choose.
author: Unknown

quote: You’re only one workout away from a good mood.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t run away from challenges. Run over them.
author: Unknown

quote: Strike fear or get struck.
author: Unknown

quote: Set goals. Exercise. Love yourself. Focus on fitness. Rest and relax. Eat right. Smile. Portray positive. Enjoy life. Care for others. Tell yourself you can do this.
author: Unknown

quote: Write the future.
author: Unknown

quote: Victory is paid for in sweat, courage, and preparation.
author: Nike

quote: Earned. Not given.
author: Unknown

quote: Greatness is earned, never awarded.
author: Unknown

quote: The harder you push, the more you are pulled.
author: Unknown

quote: Take the high road and go higher.
author: Unknown

quote: Giving up is simply not an option.
author: Unknown

quote: Success isn’t given, it is earned. On the track, on the field, in the gym. With blood, sweat, and the occasional tear.
author: Unknown

quote: Quit making excuses, putting it off, complaining about it, dreaming about it, whining about it, crying about it, believing you can’t, worrying if you can, waiting until you are older, skinnier, richer, braver, or all around better. Suck it up, hold on tight, say a prayer, make a plan & JUST DO IT.
author: Unknown

quote: Think training’s hard? Try losing.
author: Nike

quote: You don’t get it by wishing.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s not where you place, it’s how hard you worked to get there.
author: Unknown

quote: Work hard and be proud of what your achieve.
author: Unknown

quote: If it isn’t trying, you’re not trying hard enough.
author: Unknown

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it doesn’t change you. Make it burn.
author: Unknown

quote: Taking it easy won’t take you anywhere.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t get it by staring, you don’t get it by wishing, you don’t get it by drooling, you don’t get it by hoping, you don’t get it easy. You get it by getting off your ass and working for it.
author: Unknown

quote: Obsessed is a word the lazy use to describe dedicated.
author: Nike

quote: Go hard or go home.
author: Unknown

quote: Work hard. Dream big.
author: Unknown

quote: Dedicate yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Sport is not a logical proposition. It thrives on obsession, passion, and going beyond what you thought was possible. If you have a body, you are an athlete.
author: Unknown

quote: My sport is your sport’s punishment.
author: Nike

quote: Life is a sport. Make it count.
author: Unknown

quote: Make the next 12 months the year of you. Every athlete, everybody. It’s time to bring your best then better it. Whatever you do… make it count!
author: Unknown

quote: Good News: It’s a leap year. You can run 366 days.
author: Unknown

quote: Running is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
author: Nike

quote: The real purpose of running isn’t to win a race. It’s to test the limits of the human heart.
author: Unknown

quote: Mary had a little shoe it’s sole was full of air and anyone that Mary raced didn’t have a prayer.
author: Unknown

quote: Where your world becomes the next two strides.
author: Unknown

quote: Jack and Jill raced up the hill to see who was faster. Jack’s feet were bare, Jill had Nike Air, poor Jack could never catch her.
author: Unknown

quote: There are two types of people: Those who run and those who should. Nike believes in both.
author: Unknown

quote: SWOOSH. The sound made when you blow by somebody.
author: Unknown

quote: You either ran today or you didn’t.
author: Unknown

quote: Ran sounds better than run.
author: Unknown

quote: Runs end. Running doesn’t.
author: Nike

quote: Running. Sometimes, legs feel like rocks. But rocks under pressure make diamonds. Running is power.
author: Unknown

quote: It starts about the time I walk out of my front door. I reach the woods, smell the river and I just feel myself come to life again. It’s like yeah, I’m back.
author: Unknown

quote: Who says you can’t run away from your problems?
author: Unknown

quote: Someone who is busier than you is running right now.
author: Unknown

quote: But unless you are a runner, you won’t understand.
author: Unknown

quote: If you went running when you first started thinking about it, you’d be back by now.
author: Unknown

quote: Why do I run? Why do I breathe?
author: Unknown

quote: There is no ‘Y’ in running. Believe in the run.
author: Unknown

quote: There is no finish line.
author: Nike

quote: There are clubs you can’t belong to, neighborhoods you can’t live in, schools you can’t get into, but the roads are always open.
author: Unknown

quote: My feet hurt. From kicking so much ass.
author: Unknown

quote: Run more than your mouth.
author: Unknown

quote: Running never takes more than it gives back. Believe in the run.
author: Unknown

quote: I run like a girl. Keep up.
author: Unknown

quote: Play with heart.
author: Unknown

quote: Prepare for combat.
author: Nike

quote: Fear less. Do more. Get outside and get after it.
author: Unknown

quote: Leave nothing.
author: Unknown

quote: When you’ve battled for every point. When you’ve made every bone-crunching tackle and every grinding scrum count. When you’ve believed in every single man around you and dug deep into the reserves of your soul, you can look each other in the eye and know your crown may have been taken away but not without a fight.
author: Unknown

quote: We’re out there. The ones who push you. Then try to push past you. Get you up before the alarm and out sweating. Dark or rain. We give you our best to get the best from you. Scoring against us tastes sweeter. Fighting us makes you fiercer. We’re not the many. But the few close enough to get under your skin. And that’s exactly why we take you further. Move with us or against us. Together we will make it count.
author: Unknown

quote: The first hit of the game. Leaving it all on the field. Team first. A battlefield. A street fight. The feeling inside when you lay someone out. The silence before the storm. The storm. Self-discipline. 9,000 fans for a school with 800 students. Football is everything. An entire year in the weight room. Working through the pain. Doing it for all the players who wore the uniform before you. Manhood. 2-a-days in 103 degree heat. Sacrifice. What you think about 24/7/365. The silence on the bus. The crowd so loud you can’t hear yourself think. State. No excuses.
author: Unknown

quote: Just do it!
author: Unknown

quote: Every damn day. Just do it.
author: Unknown

quote: Everything you need is already inside. Just do it.
author: Nike

quote: Just do it. Then do it again.
author: Unknown

quote: Just do it even if you suck at it.
author: Unknown

quote: What you do is up to you. Just do it.
author: Unknown

quote: There is an immutable conflict at work in life and in business, a constant battle between peace and chaos. Neither can be mastered, but both can be influenced. How you go about that is the key to success.
author: Unknown

quote: The trouble in America is not that we are making too many mistakes, but that we are making too few.
author: Unknown

quote: Play by the rules, but be ferocious.
author: Phil Knight

quote: I may be over the top on this, but I just don’t want to like my competitors. I want my people to believe that whenever he and our other competitors succeed, we will be less able to do all the things we want to do.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s alright to be Goliath, but always act like David.
author: Unknown

quote: The only time you must not fail is the last time you try.
author: Unknown
